alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 07 at 7:57PM CDT until August 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Kansas, including the following county, Sherman. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 654 PM MDT, emergency management reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring. - Emergency management reports flooding ongoing in Goodland along Walnut St. at 6:45 PM MDT. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Goodland. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
